title: New Homes In London Were Delayed By 'Energy-Hungry' Data Centers
description: A London Assembly report warns that surging demand from "energy-hungry" data centers is straining the electricity grid and delaying new housing developments. With data-center electricity use expected to rise up to 600% by 2050, officials fear London's housing…
content:
Fortunately, this will lead to revival of nuclear energy. However, until these come online, this will lead to hardship where high electricity costs will severely impact poorest.
If one changes how e… [+351 chars]
